name: The Skyland Chronicles
storyline:
You are an orphaned pirate, aspiring to become the most formidable warrior the seas have ever known. Though no one knows you, your story will change everything!
Your life is a series of relentless challenges, dramatic setbacks, and unwavering resilience. You tell the tale of Franco, who serves aboard the ship of the most fearsome pirate of the 8th century. From a world where conquests, fame, gold, and freedom reign supreme, you're reborn in a place where heralding prophecies of a hero from another realm is a death wish.
In this mysterious domain, you'll forge alliances with newfound friends and join forces with rebels intent on restoring the realm of men to prominence on the Skyland map.
Your fate becomes deeply entwined with two women: one whom you'll tragically lose and another who remains your guiding light, pushing you to fight relentlessly for your very survival.
summary: You are a bloody pirate. Will you make the most of it in the new world and fulfill your destiny? This is your battle, where you'll come face to face with dark creatures from Slavic mythology. Take on the role of a legendary warrior and decide if the world is worth saving.
